title: PTI frustrated after losing power: Dr Tariq
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 12 (APP):Senior leader of Pakistan Muslim League-N, Dr Tariq Fazal Chaudhry on Monday said that Pakistan Tehreek e Insaf (PTI), leaders have been frustrated after losing power in the last elections.
The PTI had found involved in attacking on national institutions on May 9, he said while talking to a private television channel.
In reply to a question, he said the PML-N, never criticized the judiciary over the formation of benches. However PML-N
had reservation over the reserved seats matter.
To another question, he said the Opposition parties particularly PTI members should avoid playing tactics for personal interest.
The PTI should work for national interest and desist from derailing the democratic and political system, he said.
